message:
It's true that async grows through the code. In my experience, though, it's far easier to accept it as it is (and allow it to grow) than to try to use something like sync-over-async. Sync-over-async only *seems* simpler; in reality, sync-over-async always causes more problems that are much more subtle and problematic than the problems you have letting async grow.

The best way to ask questions is on Stack Overflow.
